rules_text:
Cast Sarkhan, God of Cataclysm only if your ancestry in red or your ancestry in green is five or greater.[i]
[/i]When you cast Sarkhan, God of Cataclysm, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
{2}{R}{G}: Each other creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls.
